General.Name: Grand Central Enterprises Bhd
General.Description: Grand Central Enterprises Bhd., an investment holding company, engages in the hotel business in Malaysia. The company also provides limousine, hotel management, and online reservation services. It owns and manages hotels under the Hotel Grand Continental brand name; and manages a hotel under the Hotel Grand Crystal name. Grand Central Enterprises Bhd. was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
